description: Client side event fired when a user leaves the Spot Suggestion screen ("Skip" or "Continue" button).

category.description: The event category (used to group related events).

numberPopular.description: The number of popular spots selected.

numberRecommend.description: The number of popular spots selected.

numberRegion.description: The number of regions from the spots selected.

numberSearch.description: The number of searched spots selected.

spotsPopular.description: A list of the popular spots selected.
